snippet: Eight South African police officers were charged with murder on Friday in connection with the death of a taxi driver dragged by a police vehicle, an episode that was captured on videotape.
abstract: Eight South African police officers are charged with murder in connection with death of Mido Macia, taxi driver dragged by police vehicle in epsiode that was captured on videotape.
